settings.description: Get notified if something gets changed in this node.

messages.title: Notifications
messages.no_messages: You don't have any new notifications

hints.hint_1: You may create a subscription for files and folders. The server will notify you of any changes within your subscription. Just select a file/folder an go to Subscription. You will see those notifications in your inbox {icon-warning} and you will also receive a notification by mail. A subscribed file/folder is marked with a flag {icon-volume-up}
hints.hint_2: The server will notify you if somebody shares a folder with you. You will see those notifications in your inbox {icon-warning} and you will also receive a notifification by mail.
